jobDescription: Write good quality code, intellectually interested in the finance domain, enthusiasm/ability to learn new technologies (.Net core, Angular, HTML5, React, NodeJs, AWS, Azure), build expertise and knowledge share across projects, ability to learn on the job to enhance technical and domain skills, form good peer-to-peer relationships
salaryRange: 8.52 LPA (7.5 LPA fixed component plus deferred cash & non-encashable benefits worth 1.02 Lac)
